Sentencas: Therefore, we firstly design a simple solution reduction method to modify the surface defects on perovskite-type cathode materials and further investigate the relationship between oxygen vacancy concentration and electrochemical performance.

Sentencas: The surface oxygen vacancies could improve the ability of oxygen absorption and desorption, thereby improving the activity of ORR.
